column.name: EmailTemplateType
column.summary: Enum. The Type of email for the template.

column.name: AggEmailTemplateType
column.summary: Enum:EmailType The type of email for the aggregated template.

Enumeration.name: EmailType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0 - This is a regular email that may contain our special wiki markup.
1 - Html. Basic html email which uses the master template.
2 - More advanced html that does not include the master template, user must provide everything.

column.name: EmailTemplateType
column.summary: Enum:EmailType Type of markup for the template.

Enumeration.name: EmailType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0 - This is a regular email that may contain our special wiki markup.
1 - Html. Basic html email which uses the master template.
2 - More advanced html that does not include the master template, user must provide everything.

column.name: ProcessingStatus
column.summary: Enum:CareCreditWebStatus Used to determine if the request is pending, needs action, or is completed.

column.name: ServiceType
column.summary: Enum:CareCreditServiceType Used to determine what service was requested for this web response.

column.name: TransType
column.summary: Enum:CareCreditTransType Used to determine the transaction type.

Enumeration.name: YN
Enumeration.summary: 0=Unknown,1=Yes, or 2=No. UI can be tricky. Some success with a 3x1 listbox, multicolumn, see FormPatientEdit. Radiobuttons are also an option. You can also use another YN variable to store unknown, and then use a click event on the checkbox to change to Y or N. You can also use a three state checkbox if you translate properly between the enums.

column.name: CCSource
column.summary: Enum:CreditCardSource Indicates which application made this credit card and token.

column.name: PaymentType
column.summary: FK to definition.DefNum. Payment type override for recurring charges.

Enumeration.name: LogSources
Enumeration.summary: Known entities that create security logs.

column.name: ColorBack
column.summary: Color of the mount background. Typically white for photos and black for radiographs.

column.name: ColorBack
column.summary: Color of the mount background. Typically white for photos and black for radiographs.

column.name: PaymentSource
column.summary: Enum:CreditCardSource Indicates the origin of the payment if the payment came from a credit card. Will be 'None' if this payment did not use a credit card.

column.name: LogSource
column.summary: Enum:LogSources None, WebSched, InsPlanImport834, FHIR, PatientPortal.

Enumeration.name: LogSources
Enumeration.summary: Known entities that create security logs.

column.name: CCSource
column.summary: Enum:CreditCardSource The source of where this transaction originated from.
